forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sun casts its embrace, peeling back layers of overcast and revealing glimpses of blue above. The temperatures are a dance in the mid-60s; a gentle breeze from the west-southwest adds a refreshing bite, gusting in at times. However, a hint of the marine layer lingers, softening horizons and imparting a muted charm to the skyline. As twilight approaches, expect a veil of clouds to wrap around the city, with the mercury slinking toward a more tempered 54 degrees. 

With these conditions in mind, today calls for a thoughtful layering of apparel. A light sweater or cardigan over a breathable shirt will provide comfort against the breezy spell as you traverse the streets. As night deepens, those evening hours beckon quieter pursuits—perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, with the lights of the Bay Bridge reflecting in the waters, or a visit to a cozy café to savor a warm drink and watch the world drift by. Yes, it’s a day made for relaxation and daily pleasures, enveloped by the city’s enchanting ebb and flow.
